analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0xe5f6035bafd4b1ad3c0010a3ca4086c0891b4a68.sol:
	Contract BrightenToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xe5f6035bafd4b1ad3c0010a3ca4086c0891b4a68.sol#229)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0xe5f6035bafd4b1ad3c0010a3ca4086c0891b4a68.sol#97) is not in mixedCase
